scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identified by his mitre and crosier, stands in a landscape. He is dressed in a vibrant orange chasuble with gold trim, a green cope, and white alb. He holds an open book in his left hand and his crosier in his right. The background depicts a blue sky with scattered stars, a green hill, a rocky outcrop with a tree, and in the distance, a white building with spires and a dome, suggesting a church or city. The scene is framed by an illuminated border with floral motifs.
